issue.title: Audit of topics to ensure no cheating allowed

content.raw: @d_hood Thanks.  SRC has the same problem as ARIAC in that most of the topics/services want to be disabled, but not all of them.  @_jrivero_ and I hammered out a proposal to have a blacklist of topics and services that can be specified at runtime, but neither of us has had time to implement it.
